title: Apple sees iPhone growth in Europe while Samsung sales shrink during 2021
content:
The competition is heating up between smartphone providers in Europe. iPhone growth remained steady as Samsung, the current leader, saw a decline in sales. Strategy Analytics uncovered data on smartphone sales in Europe in 2021.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple sees iPhone growth in Europe while Samsung sales shrink during 2021 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: According to Strategy Analytics, iPhone growth remained steady at 11% in Europe in 2021 as Samsung sales declined by 1%.
